slides.title: Welcome to your mental health journey
slides.content: Responsive Centers provides services to children, adolescents, adults, couples, families, and older adults in a caring and supportive environment.

slides.title: Work with clinicians who value your goals
slides.content: Our psychologists, social workers, and therapists are trained in the latest techniques for identifying, understanding, and treating a wide range of mental health conditions.

slides.title: Ready to take the next step?
slides.content: We are dedicated to helping clients reach their personal goals, solve difficult problems, and achieve a sense of mastery in their lives.

services.title: Therapy
services.content: Therapy provides a safe and confidential space for individuals, couples, and families to explore their thoughts, feelings, and experiences – fostering self-awareness and emotional healing through guided conversation.

services.title: Medication Management
services.content: Medication management is a regular process that considers changes in an individual’s health, lifestyle, and medication advancements to ensure ongoing effectiveness and safety.

services.title: Psychological Testing
services.content: Psychological testing utilizes standardized assessments and tools to objectively measure and evaluate various aspects of an individual's cognitive, emotional, and behavioral functioning.

services.title: Neuropsychological Testing
services.content: Neuropsychological testing involves a comprehensive evaluation of an individual's cognitive functions, behavior, and emotional status to assess brain-related changes due to injury, illness, or neurological conditions.

services.title: Spravato
services.content: Spravato is an intranasal formulation of ketamine that is administered in a clinical setting under supervision, usually in combination with an oral antidepressant, for treatment-resistant depression or other conditions.

services.title: Mindbloom
services.content: Sublingual ketamine - don’t have to be watched - see Saha for an evaluation - medication gets delivered to their home
